response.overview: The Official 2012 MCE insurance British Superbike Season Review! The 2012 British Superbike season saw surprises, tears and total highs from the now international line up of superbike racing megastars. The new electrifying showdown format embraced by BSB always results in an amazing spectacular season finale. Reigning champion Tommy Hill defends his crown against the Australian Josh Brookes, the returning ex champ Shane Byrne, the Japanese WSB star Nori Haga, Irelands finest Michael Laverty, and the impressive west-country rider Tommy Bridewell. Throw in the aggressive new talent of Alex Lowes and Graham Gowland, add in the vast experience of old guns Chris Walker and Michael Rutter, all of this helps to make BSB the most competitive domestic superbike racing series in the world. This 2 DVD set includes over 6 hours of intense, high octane action from the 12 rounds that made up the 2012 British superbike season.
response.title: Bristish Superbike Championship Season Review 2012
